keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will protect the Triple Lock, keep all Winter Fuel Allowance, continue free bus passes, and establish a National Care Service.

mentions.candidate: I promise that I will stand up for Plymouth’s pensioners against these cruel Tory plans.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Tories will attack pensioners’ incomes by scrapping the Triple Lock for pensions, cut the Winter Fuel Allowance for 4 in 5 pensioners in Plymouth, and introduce a ‘Dementia Tax’.
mentions.tacticalSituation: In 2015, the Tories won here by just 523 votes. This election will be close again.

issues.socialWelfare: Labour will protect the Triple Lock, keep all Winter Fuel Allowance, continue free bus passes, and establish a National Care Service. We will protect pensioners’ incomes and ensure everyone is cared for properly in retirement, without having to sell their family home.

contactInformation.address: Lockyer Hall, Alfred Street, Plymouth PL1 2RP

quotes.text: Plymouth is my home. It’s where I was born and where I live. We need a strong local MP who will stand up for us. I will always put Plymouth first.

examples: The Tories will attack pensioners’ incomes by scrapping the Triple Lock for pensions.
In 2015, the Tories won here by just 523 votes.
Cut the Winter Fuel Allowance for 4 in 5 pensioners.
I promise that I will stand up for Plymouth’s pensioners against these cruel Tory plans.
The weekend I announced a new pledge. That pledge is for you.
Plymouth is my home. It's where I was born and where I live.
I will always put Plymouth first.
Labour will protect the Triple Lock.
The Tories will attack pensioners’ incomes by scrapping the Triple Lock for pensions.
Cut the Winter Fuel Allowance for 4 in 5 pensioners.
Introduce a ‘Dementia Tax’ that will force people to sell their family homes to pay for social care.
Our Tory MP is proud that he always votes with his government. He will vote to cut your income and put homes at risk.
